name: Kids Car games for boys and girls
name_original: Kids Car games for boys and girls
description:
Fun Kids Car Games - Is your little driver a big lover of cars? If so, he or she is sure to love all of the games found in the Fun Kids Racing Games. This exciting activity app is filled with engaging car driving sounds your little driver can explore in the roads...but the Fun Kids Cars Game doesn't end there.

The activity app also comes with an supercars matching game , and many beautiful, real sport car puzzle games.
Designed for 2 years and up. Gameplay is very simple and suited for younger children - when the sound of a car or horn is played your kid needs to touch on a friendly picture.

Main features:
- Real, high quality sounds of sports car
- 4 fun memory games of car pictures
- 10 Real, high quality puzzles for 3 difficulty level with extreme sport cars, classic cars and muscle car
-WITHOUT disturbing Ads. This is a paid app, support development of future updates and new games for kids.

Another amazingly cool feature to the Fun Kids Car Games makes it even more awesome then just matching- your little boy must find the icons that link for their match choices! And when they do make a linked match the little driving game shows them the link. This important element, and the matching itself, provides a real educational bonus and playing Car Games For Kids also promotes:
-Fine motor skills.
-Memory and recognition skills.
-Hand eye coordination.
-Early math concepts.
-Driver knowledge

This application is under active development, we always welcome your suggestion to improve "car sounds and puzzles" application.
